data.name: Big Brain Brian Content Pack
data.detailed_description:
Do you want to get Hoppus to the end of his journey in style? Want to impress your friends with your fashion sense in multiplayer? Get the Hoplegs DLC to add a bit of swagger to your… hop?

Includes:


-Big Brain Brian Box
-Big Brain Brian Face
-Rainbow Beard (Face)
-Toothbrush Leg
-Ruler Leg
-Tongue Leg
-Blue Sock Leg

*languages with full audio support

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
